name: Elvis Demneri
text: Great pizzas and the best part is you can always add more toppings. Salad portions are great with many toppings available.

name: Andy Maylum
text: Amazing deals, beautifully delicious pizza. So many topping choices with no limits, or prize additions!!! New favorite pizza shop for sure

name: Brian Nickel
text: Great thin crust pizza and a great experience every time at every location! Tons of toppings to choose from. You can get anything, from a boring plain cheese pizza, to a loaded up masterpiece! AND... it is the same price! If you like your ‚Ä¶More

name: Nick Dollar
text: By far the best mod pizza location I've been too. Staff is great and always friendly. Pizza is excellent and prepared fast. Awesome environment and all around my favorite place for lunch.

name: Candie Y
text: Came in on my lunch break today with only 30 minutes to spare and seen a line to the door, was a little nervous I wouldn‚Äôt have enough time but the fact I was in and out of there in 15 minutes with a fully cooked, non burnt pizza amazed me. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiana Reed
text: The pizza is always good and the employees were very friendly.

name: Clayton Kethe
text: Great Pizza, Great Prices, They have a great selection of toppings and allow you to customize your pizza top to bottom. The staff is very friendly and always have a great smile. Honestly you can not go wrong with picking up a pizza.

name: J Wiers
text: Service quick and delicious pizza. Everyone got the topping they wanted. They even have dairy free cheese option.

name: Ambyr Valko
text: This place is great! Fairly priced, made to order, delectably thin, crispy pizza. I love that no matter what I choose toppings-wise, the price remains the same. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, and the service is super fast. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Maria Santos
text: My first experience at mod was not a good one (not this location). Giving it one more chance me and my daughter stopped in today and let me tell you, the service and food was  phenomenal!!!  The one girl really stood out to me, cooking, ‚Ä¶More

name: Don Helium
text: Being an old timer I normally stick to what I know, but the grandkids insisted on coming here for lunch. Hanna came by picked up plates off our table and asked how we enjoyed our meal. I have never experienced that when servers were not present. Her presentation and communication is the reason I found my new favorite pizza place!

name: jrm5115
text: Super friendly staff.. they have cold GOOD beer and Kara was nice and makes delicious pizza.  As soon as I walked in everyone said hello to me at once.  I might of joined a pizza cult

name: Matt Starking
text: Pizza was good atmosphere was nice. Alcohol a plus and they have 2 specialty beers on tap. The one price fits all is great make it however you want with as many toppings as you want and it won't cost you a dime more.üçï

name: Mike
text: Great staff very customer friendly, amazing service, great prices, incredible food. It's a must have. Keep up the good work guys

name: Mark Ellsworth
text: Good pizza if you like thin crust. I like the simplicity of ordering your pizza while they make it up as you request your toppings. A lot of options which are always fresh. Not the best value for your dollar but fun to take kids and they ‚Ä¶More

name: Brittani Austin
text: The kids love coming to Mod pizza.  It's quick and fun.  Doesn't cure my craving for really good Pizza but there are so many pros to this place that it doesn't matter when you have your kids with you!  Fresh ingredients and you watch your pizza being made.  Think Subway for pizza.  Not expensive and for a good family experience.

name: Kelli Cossey
text: I love their pizza! You can make your own with many ingredients or choose from their list. They have different kinds f crust! Delicious!

name: Sophia Gardner
text: Pizzas are always delicious. I love that when i go in the manager kara even knows me by my name.  I love that you can get unlimited topings. would give a 10 if i could

name: Beverly Azar
text: Love the concept and atmosphere. It is a couple dollars more than expected; however, it's well worth it! Great experience, tasty food, clean restaurant, patient and warm crew. What more could you ask for?

name: Elizabeth Zglimbea
text: Workers should learn how to top pizzas better, they sorta just glob it all in chunks in the very center of the pie, which makes it hard to eat, and half of the pizza not have toppings.... But aside from that, fresh and yummy ingredients!! You can't go wrong.

name: Michael Kesteloot
text: Very good, I prefer mod over blaze pizza any day of the week

name: Michael Krajnak
text: If you like thin crust this is the place for you. It's a create your own pizza add unlimited toppings and cheese types for 9 bucks. Toppings are fresh and flavorful and they have some unique drink options as well.

name: Pranav Bollavaram
text: Fair price, good quality preparation, clean tables, inviting atmosphere, polite staff, and good tasting personal pizzas. I would definitely recommend.

text: I wrote the greatest love letter to my wife, must have been the pizza.

text: We love MOD Pizza!
